nodes.text: The Internal Security Bureau was a feared agency within the Galactic Empire. Agents of the bureau were present everywhere in order to ensure proper loyalty.

The Internal Security Bureau was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018. The bureau's first mention within the Star Wars Legends continuity was in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, a reference book released in 2008.
